location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from N B Edmonstone, Secretary at Fort St George, to William Bruce, Resident at Abusheher

mods.abstract: Letter from N B Edmonstone, Secretary at Fort St George, to William Bruce, Resident at Abusheher [Bushire], acknowledging the receipt of dispatches, informing that the Governor hadn't received any accounts of the disbursements for Sir Harford Jones's mission, approving of the mission of Moonshee Mohummud Hussein Khan to Sheerauz to convey a letter to the King, and informing that Brigadier General John Malcolm, appointed Envoy Plenipotentiary to the Court of Persia, was about to pass via Abusheher on his way to Persia.
